name: my-gitlab-dashboard
title: My GitLab Dashboard
description: Track merge requests and pipelines from all your projects in one single place
author: mikybars

commands.name: dashboardCommand
commands.title: Dashboard
commands.description: All MRs and pipelines of your projects at a glance

commands.name: selectProjectsCommand
commands.title: Select My Projects
commands.description: Choose which projects to include in the dashboard

preferences.name: gitlabInstance
preferences.title: GitLab URL
preferences.placeholder: URL of your GitLab instance e.g. https://gitlab.com

preferences.name: gitlabToken
preferences.title: API Token
preferences.description: Your GitLab API token. `api` scope for read and write operations, `read_api` when you just want to read only commands.

preferences.name: jiraInstance
preferences.title: Jira URL
preferences.placeholder: URL of your Jira instance e.g. https://jira.com

preferences.name: softWarningDateThreshold
preferences.title: Soft warning threshold for dates
preferences.description: Creation and modification times that are past this value will be displayed in a different colour

preferences.name: hardWarningDateThreshold
preferences.title: Hard warning threshold for dates
preferences.description: Creation and modification times that are past this value will be displayed in a different colour and show an alert icon

preferences.name: colorizedDatesForPipelines
preferences.title: Dates
preferences.label: Colorized dates for pipelines
preferences.description: Show colorized dates for pipelines last runs depending on the thresholds defined above

preferences.name: colorizedDatesForMergeRequests
preferences.label: Colorized dates for MRs
preferences.description: Show colorized dates for MRs creation dates depending on the thresholds defined above

preferences.name: colorizedDatesForComments
preferences.label: Colorized dates for comments
preferences.description: Show colorized dates for MRs unresolved comments depending on the thresholds defined above
